name: Blobs (18jwong)
description:
WASD - to move

E - toggle height

your goal is to get blobs into your loop to get points for upgrades

shift+click to buy 10 upgrades

crtl+click to buy 100

made for Ludum Dare 47

theme is stuck in a loop

you play a loop

the music loops

I hate the theme

git repo: https://github.com/18jwong/LudumDare47
